code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [FinTech_TransactionQueue] --> Lobby
    Lobby --> GameStarted: Host Starts
    GameStarted --> QuestionPrep: Init Question
    QuestionPrep --> QuestionActive: Host Shows
    QuestionActive --> AnswerValidation: Player Buzzes
    AnswerValidation --> QuestionPrep: Correct Answer
    AnswerValidation --> QuestionActive: Wrong Answer
    QuestionPrep --> GameOver: Host Ends
    GameOver --> [FinTech_AuthVault]
